yearRound.name: Rice
yearRound.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

yearRound.name: Wheat Flour
yearRound.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

yearRound.name: Bouquet
yearRound.description: A gift that shows your romantic interest. (Unlocked after reaching level 2 friendship with a player)

yearRound.name: Wedding Ring
yearRound.description: It's used to ask for another farmer's hand in marriage. (Unlocked after reaching level 3 friendship with a player)

yearRound.name: Dehydrator (Recipe)
yearRound.description: A recipe to make Dehydrator

yearRound.name: Grass Starter (Recipe)
yearRound.description: A recipe to make Grass Starter

yearRound.name: Sugar
yearRound.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

yearRound.name: Oil
yearRound.description: All purpose cooking oil.

yearRound.name: Vinegar
yearRound.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

yearRound.name: Deluxe Retaining Soil
yearRound.description: This soil has a 100% chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Grass Starter
yearRound.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

yearRound.name: Speed-Gro
yearRound.description: Makes the plants grow 1 day earlier.

yearRound.name: Apple Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Apricot Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Cherry Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Orange Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Peach Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Pomegranate Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Basic Retaining Soil
yearRound.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Quality Retaining Soil
yearRound.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

backpacks.name: Large Pack
backpacks.description: Unlocks the 2nd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 24).
backpacks.available: At the start of the game

backpacks.name: Deluxe Pack
backpacks.description: Unlocks the 3rd row of inventory (infinite slots).

SPRING.name: Parsnip Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

SPRING.name: Bean Starter
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

SPRING.name: Cauliflower Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.

SPRING.name: Potato Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

SPRING.name: Strawberry Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in spring. Takes 8 days to mature, and keeps producing strawberries after that.

SPRING.name: Tulip Bulb
SPRING.description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.

SPRING.name: Kale Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

SPRING.name: Coffee Beans
SPRING.description: Plant in summer or spring. Takes 10 days to grow, Then produces coffee Beans every other day.

SPRING.name: Carrot Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant in the spring. Takes 3 days to grow.

SPRING.name: Rhubarb Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 13 days to mature.

SPRING.name: Jazz Seeds
SPRING.description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.

SUMMER.name: Tomato Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

SUMMER.name: Pepper Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

SUMMER.name: Wheat Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

SUMMER.name: Summer Squash Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant in the summer. Takes 6 days to grow, and continues to produce after first harvest.

SUMMER.name: Radish Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 6 days to mature.

SUMMER.name: Melon Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 12 days to mature.

SUMMER.name: Hops Starter
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

SUMMER.name: Poppy Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant in summer. Produces a bright red flower in 7 days.

SUMMER.name: Spangle Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce a vibrant tropical flower. Assorted colors.

SUMMER.name: Starfruit Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature.

SUMMER.name: Coffee Beans
SUMMER.description: Plant in summer or spring. Takes 10 days to grow, Then produces coffee Beans every other day.

SUMMER.name: Sunflower Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

SUMMER.name: Red Cabbage Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 9 days to mature.

SUMMER.name: Blueberry Seeds
SUMMER.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

FALL.name: Corn Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

FALL.name: Eggplant Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

FALL.name: Pumpkin Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 13 days to mature.

FALL.name: Broccoli Seeds
FALL.description: Plant in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

FALL.name: Amaranth Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to grow. Harvest with the scythe.

FALL.name: Grape Starter
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

FALL.name: Beet Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature.

FALL.name: Yam Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to mature.

FALL.name: Bok Choy Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 4 days to mature.

FALL.name: Cranberry Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

FALL.name: Sunflower Seeds
FALL.description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

FALL.name: Fairy Seeds
FALL.description: Plant in fall. Takes 12 days to produce a mysterious flower. Assorted Colors.

FALL.name: Rare Seed
FALL.description: Sow in fall. Takes all season to grow.

FALL.name: Wheat Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

FALL.name: Artichoke Seeds
FALL.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature.

WINTER.name: Powdermelon Seeds
WINTER.description: This special melon grows in the winter. Takes 7 days to grow.
